sense.gloss: (sound of) wind blowing through pine trees
(sound of) steam whistling in a kettle (at a tea ceremony)
matsukaze, sugar-glazed cookie sprinkled with sesame or poppy seeds

sdata.j: あなたは↑病犬↑↓やまいぬ↓に↑噛↑↓か↓まれたら、↑破傷風↑↓は|しょうふう|↓の↑予防↑↓よぼう↓↑注射↑↓ちゅうしゃ↓が↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓となってしまいます。
sdata.e: If you get bit by a rabid dog, you'll need a tetanus shot.
